pages.text: Welcome to the world of Soul Magic! To get started you are going to need $(l:soulmagic:soul_essence)soul essence$(/l). To get some, you will first need to craft a $(l:soulmagic:soul_essence/soul_essence_staff)Soul Essence Staff$(/l). If you kill some mobs with the soul staff in your inventory it will fill up with soul essence.
